The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 05 November is 955,236 (1,697.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 31 October, there were 130,014 new confirmed cases (231.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 October, there were 127,899 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 2% ( 2,115 extra cases).
